Message: I wonder when it all changed.

We were supposed
to be fighting to live,

but now, we were
living to fight.

The battles were violent,
and yet, we were still
treated as pawns.

But, it didn’t matter how
relentless the missions
we were mobilized for were—

Our unit was
small in number,
but we never once
lost a single soldier.

Before long, this lot of
detestable witches were
called by a new name—

I was so happy.
My subordinates—
my comrades were
finally able to smile.

We found that thing
called a reason to live.

...But, it would’ve been
much better if my story
ended right here.
